page.title: 09BEAULIEU VILLAGE
page.content: { BEAULIEU }is a small village right in the NEW FOREST. There is a huge motor museum .It's owned by lord Montagu. There is the remains of an abbey called{CISTERCIAN }founded in 1204. There is a very famous chocolate shop in the village of {BEAULIEU}.It sends chocolate's all over England. There is also a shop called the Village gift shop. It sells all kinds of little gifts. There is a river in BEAULIEU. It's called the {BEAULIEU RIVER.}The animals from the NEW FOREST can just walk around BEAULIEU freely.There is a public house named after LORD MONTAGU. It's called the MONTAGU ARMS.
